comment: Prof. Freeman is a sweet and helpful person. Class was easy but a lot of tedious work especially in 1121. If you attend all classes and do the work, you are for certain to get an A.

TAKE HER TAKE HER TAKE HER! She's such a sweet lady that's willing to help you with ANY issues you have! The work load is heavy; there are many tedious assignments, but if you just do it, you'll get nothing less than an 'A' in the class. Easiest A I've ever made in my life.

She is an extraordinary teacher!  One of the best I have EVER had! She is extremely sweet and tremendously respectful! She goes out of her way for students, and really wants them to succeed! She is a great person! This class has a lot of work, but it is very easy! Definitely take her!

This class was extremely easy. Professor Freeman is great. There's a medium workload, but READ the textbook for tests. The powerpoints are only part of what will it be on the exams. If you show up, listen, and hand in work on time, your guaranteed an A.

Very helpful. Very nice. Tests are challenging but not too hard. Easy A though. I made up all my campus events (didn't go to a single one) but still got full credit for them. This class will be the least of your worries.

I love professor Freeman! She is so sweet and extremely easy. The exams are multiple choice and extremely easy if you just skim through the book chapters. Also, she tells you EXACTLY what will be on the exams the class before the exam. LOVE HER!

Prof Freeman is so sweet! Will help you with any questions. Such an easy grader and she loves teaching. You need to attend class when it's listed on the syllabus. You need the workbook to pass the class!
If You do not get an A in this class you don't belong at KSU.
In her class now: sweetest professor ever. Do the work and your given an A+ Easy, Easy, Easy, Obviously take her for ksu 1101. I love her! and anyone would!
Could have made an A in the third grade.  Show up and do you're work and you will be fine.
The sweetest woman at KSU.  For the final, we all brought in food and in groups made a list of the most important things for freshman to know.  Obv this class is the one to take..

Maybe the easiest A you can get in college. Attendance is mandatory but you can miss three days and nothing will happen to your grade. If you do all the work and turn it in, you will receive an A on it.If you can not get an A in this class it's bc you did not come or did not do your work like you were suppose to. Take her good prof

I LOVE HER! She is so sweet and so helpful!! THis class is so easy!! its not the most intresting class you will take in college but she makes it so easy.  You can only miss 4 days but she will work with you if you are sick or need help with anything! TAKE HER!

Mrs. Freeman is a really sweet woman. She is very understanding. Attendance isn't mandatory but she does take attendance, and if you miss more than 4 classes she drops a letter grade. Personally, I think KSU1101 is a waste of time and money... but she makes it interesting. Study for tests. And do the papers. Easy Class for sure.

Coming in to this semester, I was dreading having to take this class, but having Professor Freeman made this class so much better than I was expecting it to be.  She is extremely helpful and nice, and she actually made the material in the class somewhat interesting.  It's a pretty easy class, just do the assignments and study.
